casebody.data:
BOYD
v.
KINGDOM TRUST CO. 2017-1336 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 6, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

Certified Question of State Law, United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit, No. 17-3026. On motions for admission pro hac vice of Kevin A. Hall and M. Todd Carroll. Motions granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
